This application lets you browse popular movies and filter them by genre! You can also search for specific movies! If during your searches you see anything interesting, you can mark it as seen, or want to see, and it will be added to your list! Anything that you have marked as seen can also be rated. Before long, you\'ll have your movie list in your pocket, with your own ratings, critic ratings, and a brief description of the movie.
This means that a movie marked as \'want to see.\' Simply click the body of a movie once and it will be added to your list, and marked as \'want to see.\'
This means that you\'ve seen a movie. Click the body of a movie a second time to mark it as \'has seen.\' When a movie is marked as \'has seen,\' you can rate it out of 5.
-Long click an item to delete it from your list!
These stars serve as an indication of your personal rating for any movies you\'ve seen!
